name: acp3/module-gallery
description: Provides the gallery module for the ACP3 CMS.

suggest.acp3/setup: Allows you to comfortably install and update the ACP3 components via an UI.
suggest.acp3/module-gallery-comments: Allows you to integrate the gallery module into the comments module.
suggest.acp3/module-gallery-seo: Allows you to integrate the gallery module into the SEO module.
suggest.acp3/module-gallery-share: Allows you to integrate the gallery module into the social sharing module.
